website_summaries.verdict: Provides just the right amount of heat in a fit that is practical by itself for cool days or layered with other jackets when the weather turns frigid.
pros: Lightweight vest design offers warmth without bulk
Nice option for layering under other jackets and coats
Has 4 heat settings and can get up to 8 hours of heat per charge on the lowest setting
cons: Fit can be inconsistent: either too small or too large
A few reports of one or more heat zones not working

customer_reviews.title: Inferior version of Men's vest
customer_reviews.text: The battery that comes with the women's vest is an older model than the battery that comes with the men's vest. The battery pack for the men's vest comes with a button to see how much battery life is left. However, I have to plug my battery pack in to the charger to confirm how much battery life is left. Also, the zipper color is more maroon than pink which is what I prefer. However, I wish the company made an all black version (like the men's style) since not all women like pink/red colors
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Great product for those chilly days at the field
customer_reviews.text: Bought this vest in a size Medium for my wife to wear during chilly days at the soccer field. She is a medium in most women's tops and this fits snug, which is perfect - enough room for a long sleeve tee shirt underneath or tight with a sweatshirt underneath, but room to put a sweatshirt or jacket over top too. We found it works best with a tee shirt, then vest - keeps the heat closer to the skin than putting over a sweatshirt. This works great and gives her plenty of warmth to last several hours.
customer_reviews.author: Father of 3

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: The vest was not bulky but very comfortable. The heating unit worked really well. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: et

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE UNWILLING TO HELP THEIR BUYERS
customer_reviews.text: We had a problem with the cord not having proper connectivity with the battery. We contacted the manufacturer directly and have been blatantly ignored. Was told that because we purchased this through Amazon they won’t do anything for us. NOT HAPPY AT ALL. So if you want to spend a lot of money on a vest that may or may not work and then get ZERO resolution knock yourself out! HORRIBLE SERVICE AND NOW STUCK WITH AN OVER PRICED VEST THAT DOES NOT WORK.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Backmann

customer_reviews.title: Does in 3 hours and charges in 10 hours. DONT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: The battery does not last anywhere near 10 hours. If you have it on low it will last 4-5 hours if you have it on high you can expect 3-4 hours. The real issue is that it takes 9 hours to get a full charge! I tried reaching out to ororo about this and they clearly knew that the jacket didn’t actually last anywhere near 10 hours. Their customer service is garbage. There are better companies out there for heated wear.
customer_reviews.author: Eric aguilera

customer_reviews.title: Two Broken Vests
customer_reviews.text: I really really wanted to give this vest a 5 star review because I love how it fits and looks and feels when it turns on. Unfortunately the first one I ordered would randomly shut off and not turn on at some points. I returned it and bought another one and have the same exact problem with it. I’m going to have to go with another brand unfortunately !
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Knipp

customer_reviews.title: sizing shenanigans
customer_reviews.text: After reading the company's sizing chart, and reading a ton of user reviews, I chose a Medium as a gift for my wife. She swims in it. Had to return and order a Small. So women, I hope this helps. She's: 5'5" 120 lbs. Bust: 38" Waist: 28" Hips: 38" Her feeling, which makes total sense, is that it should be somewhat snug so cold air doesn't come wafting in every time you move. Will update the review after the Small shows up.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Krogh

customer_reviews.title: Heats up good but items missing!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 (women Med & men Med). Just received it and they seam to heat up good but haven’t used it outside yet. The man’s vest came with charger and a nice bag. The women vest did NOT have a bag or a charger!! See pics below. Update: although items were missing, customer service was awesome. They sent me not only the charger & bag that was missing but an extra battery. They also were very good on following up to make sure I got everything.
customer_reviews.author: Ka K. Chang

customer_reviews.title: Bad battery
customer_reviews.text: It came with a battery that doesn’t stay charged or activate the jacket. No response from the company on my request to replace the battery and ship back the bad one. So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Lori P.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Order a size up from your normal - the sizing does not account for the bulky battery pack, so you'll need the extra room. You'll have to recharge it pretty frequently, bit that's a small price to pay for how warm it is. The heat seems to be extra concentrated around the neck, which is great. I frequently wear mine under a big coat for extra warmth. It's also perfect for running errands without a bulky jacket - just click it on a few minutes before you arrive at your destination so it can preheat before you get out of the car.
customer_reviews.author: hayley gardner

customer_reviews.title: My wife is a celebrity at sporting events.
customer_reviews.text: My wife is nice and toasty, uses this vest for campouts and watching the boys football games. This vest has a really cool light on the front which prompts some questions. Many of my friends have wanted me to send this link so they could purchase one for their wife. Happy Wife, Happy Life. The rechargeable battery pack even has a USB port you can use to charge your phone. I can't say enough about this vest. Hope my wife purchases one for me for Christmas this year. Hint, Hint!!!! Just not pink. =0) My wife stated, this is one of the best Christmas gifts she's ever received. The price is right also!!!!! Very high quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Waldron

customer_reviews.title: Pays for itself 1st season from not buying hand-warmers. Very well designed product.
customer_reviews.text: I have other electric heated jackets and the Ororo is by far the best. The battery is in the most out-of-the-way place possible and doesn't take up pocket space that your other items need. It heats the collar, front, back and pockets- plus can charge your cell phone. I got a spare battery so I can use the vest if one battery is charging. Everyone who sees it wants one. The only bad thing is the little light that stays on in front and everyone points it out. It seems to run just slightly larger than expected. I don't know how I lived without it.
customer_reviews.author: courteous

customer_reviews.title: Nice!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted a heated vest for her birthday this year. I did some research and found that this was one of the highest rated vests on the market, so I bought it for her. The other day, she remarked that this vest was the greatest present she’s ever gotten. She absolutely loves everything about it...the fit, the styling and the fact is keeps her warm on campus now that the temperature is plummeting. Overall a great buy
customer_reviews.author: Didi58

customer_reviews.title: Heated neck zone does not work!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this vest because of the heated neck color and that part doesn’t even get warm. Feels very cheaply made. The vest is also very large and does not seem to be cut like a normal vest. Very oddly shaped. I don’t see this vest fitting anyone. I would not suggest spending the money on this vest, hand warmers work better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great idea-  Not so great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife for Christmas and she absolutely loved it... When it worked. The vest turns off on its own when she wears it... not twice an hour, more like 20 times an hour. I have tried the “improved” connector for active use and it made no improvement. She was wearing it around the house only. I have tried to contact the manufacturer to get it fixed/corrected and been ignored. Good heat, right locations, doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew H.

customer_reviews.title: Warms up fast
customer_reviews.text: It's really to soon for 5 stars since I haven't wore it yet but I did charge the battery and try it out. It got warm immediately and I absolutely love that the neck has heat. If my neck is warm my body is warm. I'm always cold and work outside in PA so this will be a great addition to my winter attire. I'm thin and tall and the reviews said it ran big so I ordered a med. It's very snug. I won't be able to wear anything other than a this long sleeve shirt under it. But it fits nice and figure flattering
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl C

customer_reviews.title: update: battery only lasted 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Update: 01/2020 I wore this vest last season. I got it out for this season and the battery won’t charge. Essentially it only worked for 3 months in winter 2019. 2019: I layer the vest with other garments to keep me warm on construction sites in cold windy Indiana areas. Very stylish to wear outside of construction activities. My only complaint is that the jack doesn’t stay inside the battery as I move around and then I have to take all my layers off to put it back in. The jack needs to snap/lock in place like other types of jacks.
customer_reviews.author: RunGirlRun

customer_reviews.title: This vest is awesome but way too big
customer_reviews.text: This vest is awesome but way too big. I am 5'8" 135 pounds and a large was huge on me. A medium would be perfect to wear as an outer layer but I reordered a small so I can have it close to my body over one small thermal shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Spidey

customer_reviews.title: 2 flaws, but still great
customer_reviews.text: This vest is amazing! It feels like I am wearing a warm hug from someone I love. There are 2 things that I do not like about it though. 1. The on/off button lights up while the vest is on.... it’s odd. I do t like it. People notice it and ask. It makes me feel like Rudolph. 2. The battery pack is large, heavy, and located on the side- so it makes me look wide. I don’t think there is a good location for a battery this large..... I really like the settings, the fabric seems durable, and it is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: barely gets warm, used it once and haven't used ...
customer_reviews.text: barely gets warm, used it once and haven't used it since. We bought another one made by Milwaukee that was more expensive, but actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J Kemnitz

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this is fitted it looks better on with out a jacket so that works I like where the battery was placed it off sets the side pocket unlinke the venture heated vest which is right on the pocket area one thing I would be to have a longer life battery I ride motorcycles and I have never put vest on hi always med or low and it hasn’t ever got the hours that your advertising
customer_reviews.author: Vicakin

customer_reviews.title: Customer service sucks
customer_reviews.text: This product came with a defective battery that would not take a charge. They claim a 6 months warranty on the battery and i have tried to contact customer service but have heard nothing from them. For this reason i would not recommend this product. I only give it one star because I had to would rate it at zero star, dont buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: So. Good.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased one for my wife and another for my mother... They LOVE them, and now all our friends are ordering them as well. Recommend ordering a second battery if you are going to be in the cold for more than 3-4 hours. They look really sharp and are very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Ben DeBoer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this vest
customer_reviews.text: This thing has saved me multiple times when it has gotten really windy. I just click it on and I'm warmed up in seconds. I have used it in the Canadian wilderness under my ski jacket and really only needed to click it on when the wind started blowing. Another time I used it at a concert. Its very handy and looks great. I'm not sure the battery would last as long as advertised, but certainly can get several hours out of it. Only issue is the size small is pretty tight, but the medium has large arm holes (which lets the heat out). I usually go with the small (I own both sizes). 5'7" 130# DD.
customer_reviews.author: Florida girl

customer_reviews.title: Love my vest!
customer_reviews.text: On a snowy winter evening, I noticed my daughter wearing a vest with a small circular light. She explained that it was a heated vest and she could adjust the level of heat. Since I am a senior and always cold, I immediately ordered the vest. I wear it on airplanes which are often uncomfortably cold. I also wear the vest around the house or whenever I feel a bit chilly. My daughter says the vest feels like a warm hug. I have to agree! The battery lasts all day in my case. The only issue is that I had to cover the light when I attended a play as it could have been distracting to others.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly so far after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says, I can't do without it! I am even saving on heating because I don't need to turn on the heater as often anymore. Plus, you bring the heat with you everywhere you go. I purchased the version without sleeves so I can wear under my usual coats, so I can chose my favorite look every time, and this strategy works. If you need to feel a more intense heat, just wear a sweater or cardigan on top of it. The producer has made it a mission to ensure they listen to customers and have perfected the product over time.
customer_reviews.author: Thisisme

customer_reviews.title: Hey Guys!! This is a perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my girlfriend and she loves it!! Its a lightweight vest so she can put it under anything but it looks good too so she'll wear it as an outerwear if its dry out. The battery also has a separate USB socket for phone chargers or anything else that needs USB power. Seeing her excited as she was when she got it was worth more that 5 stars to me. Thanks ORORO!!
customer_reviews.author: Josh M

customer_reviews.title: One of the best items I purchased for a cold office and work environment
customer_reviews.text: This item is great. I work at night and the temp is unbearable. After complaining long enough, I found this beautiflly well made product that can be used at tailgate parties, on cool evenings or anywhere one might go and be chilly. I don't care for the illuminating light because I am constantly being asked about the light. At first it was okay, but now I am just annoyed by it. I do wish that they omitted this from the product. Life would be more enjoyable. however it catches the eye and people seem genuinely interested in purchasing one for themselves.
customer_reviews.author: t nelson

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter to wear under her band uniform for cold performances. She wore it all day in school the first day that she had it and didn't want to take it off. There are only two negative points: 1) she mentioned that the battery is in an awkward position and may be better if it were placed in the from rather than the lower back. 2) The battery pack doesn't power the vest through the usb port but through another connector, so you can't use any other power pack and additional packs from Ororo are around $80. Overall, she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Battery is Already Failing - Company Replaced It
customer_reviews.text: Update Review: 7 Mar 2020 The company reached out to me and sent a replacement battery. I’m hoping that this one is better. Customer service was covert good, Original Review: My wife loves the vest but there are some issues. After 20ish battery charges at normal room temperature, ours battery is swelling. It will easily fail or become dangerous within a year. Battery pack is designed so that you cannot use any other battery pack and cost $70. Normal portable batteries with 3 to 4 times the capacity cost half as much. On high, the battery last 2.5 hours
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Gregoire

customer_reviews.title: Awesome vest, narrow in hips with battery pack
customer_reviews.text: As someone who is always cold, I absolutely love this vest. I'm 5'2 125lbs 32b and the medium fits. It is definitely a bit narrow in the hips (because of the location of the battery) but I'd be swimming in the large. Easy to use, charge, and I've successfully washed it (just remember to hang to dry!)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, wife is happy
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, wife is happy. She has used it a few days a week for about a month and a half, still working well.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: is comfortable, and the extra battery I ordered means I ...
customer_reviews.text: This heated vest is a life saver. Usually, I can heat it on the medium setting. However, if it gets below 0 degrees much, I will use the high setting. It fits well, is comfortable, and the extra battery I ordered means I always can swap for a fresh one. It is much easier to care for my horses with this vest!
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Life Changing
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend HATES being cold and she didn’t know these existed till I surprised her with the vest. She smiles uncontrollably every morning when she puts it on. It lasts her all day and she will never be able to go without one now. If it ever stops working we’ll overnight a new one I’m sure.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit well
customer_reviews.text: I am a petite woman (larger chest) and this fits like it would fit a man; very strange cut. I think the heating mechanism was great and love how it heats the neck but did not like that it didn’t fit snugly so I didn’t feel like it worked like it should. Furthermore, what is the point of having a USB charger of the other side of the plug is uncommon? It’s not a micro or mini USB so if the very large battery were to run out, not sure how you would charge it with a portable charger you could stick in your pocket. Unfortunately, I had to return due to poor got.
customer_reviews.author: DLF

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for keeping you warm.
customer_reviews.text: I have only had the opportunity to use this vest a couple of times, but it was awesome the times I have! I am always cold and it takes me a very long time to warm up once I get really chilled. So, when two of my boys decided to do football this year I knew I needed something to help keep me warm. This helped tremendously! It warms your entire back all the way up to the neck as well as the front pockets. Now I just need heated pants!😉 For me, it has definitely been worth the cost. It will be great for the start of soccer season too.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor adventures heated vest
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and comfortable fit The fabric is very good in the rain. It’s water repellent. The battery was ok depending on the setting. Low medium high High last maybe 2-3 hr med 4-5 hr and low about 6-8 But my battery had an issue, I called the customer service they response and help me ASAP Best customer services.
customer_reviews.author: NightOwL

customer_reviews.title: Great way to keep warm!
customer_reviews.text: I'm always cold so this is great! A friend had one of the vests & highly recommended it. I love it! I can wear it just as a regular vest if it's not too cold & then turn it on when things chill up. It's good quality, long enough to not ride up in the back, and heats up quickly. One thing to note is that the logo is a bright light when its turned on. It feels conspicuous, but I'm getting used to it. We bought one for my mother-in-law too. She likes it too. I would recommend this vest.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: you might want to order up
customer_reviews.text: This vest is nice light not bulky and I hope it will be great. I would recommend if you are close to the larger of the measurements I would order up our it will be too small. I will write more after I wear it. I wore this vest in 20 degree weather for 3 hours and it was great! I would not have been able to stay out half as long without this vest. Very comfortable I forgot I had it on except for feeling warm. I am so impressed I ordered one for a friend for a Christmas present. Now I can do what I need outside in the winter and horseback ride much more comfortably. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizes
customer_reviews.text: My first small fit perfectly! But the battery died. Received second small.. the vest was so small I couldn’t zip it closed. I had to reorder a Medium size one. I work Construction- outside all day, I wear the vest inside my rain gear, keep the temp on low it last for 12 hrs 😊 thank you. Here’s my size Incase Bust 36 Waist 27 2nd vest button stopped working 🤬
customer_reviews.author: Judyb

customer_reviews.title: These vests, coats, heated etc, Are The Best In My Book!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a diabetic and my body temp is lowered and cold all the time in the winter. These vests are wonderful and I have purchased over 20 of these vest for friends, family and strangers that truly needed one and have a coat for my wife and she extremely love it!!! These vest maintain your body core heat, maintains or can be set cooler as well, less warm etc. Nice fleece lining that also keeps you warm with the heater. GREAT PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Pruitt

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: This purchase has been wonderful! It heats up very quickly and has been a game changer for cool/cold outdoor activites. I knocked off one star because of the battery pack. It’s a little cumbersome and does take quite some time to fully charge. Also, the button to change the temperature is a light that changes color based on the temp and it is VERY bright. I have to cover it with electrical tape if I’m using it at night. Neither of those cons change my opinion on the jacket though, I absolutely LOVE it.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle S.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for another heated vest, (Polaris) which only last 2 months before the battery/pocket connection shorted out. This vest seems like a much higher quality. I especially like the heated collar. heated pockets/core, and the heated back. I also like the fact that other than to check the battery charge left you do not need to access the battery pack. Controlling the settings by the easily visible lighted chest patch is great. I love it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Badger

customer_reviews.title: Love but issues with product twice now-issues were resolved. Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Update: was sent new vest and a partial credit from the company. Excellent customer service and I love the vest I had the jacket and loved it until it quit working. Ororo sent me a new one after reaching out to me via a question I posted on amazon. I also wanted the vest. It has been great until today when I noticed the inside material started coming out like cotton coming through jacket. I’ve asked for an exchange. Overall they are good products and the company has been great about resolving issues.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: We read reviews and knew their are snug fit, running slightly small. I’ve purchased two and both fix as expected after reading reviews. Excellent product. I wear a jacket over mine but my daughter doesn’t she wears sweatshirt under. Perfect For outdoor or indoor events where it’s cold. We wear to fall and winter horse shows and it’s perfect! Learned the hard way not to turn on until out of truck. Don’t need while driving, forgot this. So first use I was out of battery by lunch. Now I know and I can last all day.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, gets hot
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'4" and 130lbs and the medium fits me perfectly. Not too loose and not too tight at all. I turned it on and it got pretty hot pretty quick, but that was just inside my house. I am going to arctic Norway in January and will report back after using it in for a week in below freezing temperatures there! Edit: Just got back from Tromso, Norway, where the temperatures ranged from single digits to 20's (Fahrenheit) and this vest kept me super warm. I love it. It is a bit puffy, but still fits underneath my other jackets just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Battery pack not holding charge?
customer_reviews.text: Update: 11/5/19- had an issue with original battery not holding a charge. But just updated rating to 5 stars . Hilary at customer service was awesome! She quickly responded and ultimately sent a new battery. The vest works great! And my sister is wearing it almost daily, while inside and out! Original post: Purchased early Xmas gift last week for my sister. It arrived promptly and the medium size fit was fine. But she followed all the battery charging instructions and battery held charge for only 1 hour the first time and time went down from there. Contacting manufacturer. Will revise rating afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: They need to improve on the battery they use
customer_reviews.text: My wife use it 3 times, the first time the battery lasted about 5 hours , the second time the battery lasted only 3 hours and the third time the battery only lasted 1 hour. When it worked it worked great , but with the battery issues I wouldn’t recommend buying this product..
customer_reviews.author: Mike M.

customer_reviews.title: Better than the competition, but make sure it works a few times after buying!
customer_reviews.text: Love the Ororo heated vest!!! A feature that sets this apart from the competition is the front heating section is located over the pockets -- a built in hand warmer. Additionally, the back of the neck has a heated section. Bonus! The only reason I didn't give this five stars is it didn't work the second time I used it, and had to return it for an exchange. If you buy this product through Amazon I recommend using it at least a few times before the 30 day return policy expires.
customer_reviews.author: CaliGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great vest
customer_reviews.text: Nice vest all around. Except I didn't get a battery when it got delivered!! Update: they sent a new battery and I LOVE the vest!!! I wear it on the motorcycle and it keeps me warm! Battery doesn't last as long as I like but the vest is definitely worth it!!! The neck warmer is the main reason I got this and it really gets warm!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: SUPER vest to keep you warm ALL winter
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly!! Keeps your neck, mid section and back toasty warm and it's light weight. Sizing is small in the bust. I am a 34B and the small is slightly tight across chest, but fits nicely everywhere else. Length and waist are good. Like that I can wear it under a winter coat if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Angela P.

customer_reviews.title: Heating elements in perfect location
customer_reviews.text: This vest is exactly what I was hoping it would be. The heat, on the highest setting, is strong and the heating elements are placed in good locations so your hands get toasty warm in the pockets and your neck and upper back allow the warmth to travel down the spine. Its almost therapeutic and would be perfect for someone who carries extra tension in their shoulders. Cant wait to bring it out on the slopes for the chilly chair lift rides. If I could improve it the design is a bit tight around the hips with the battery pack so if you are more a 'pear' you may want to consider 1 size bigger than normal.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Connor

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my elderly mother who is always cold. Her home has rooms that are drafty and she can't seem to stay warm in them. I love the 9 hour battery. I bought her a spare so she can just swap one for the other. I love that you can charge a phone on the battery if needed. Pockets are a good size and it fits true to size. The three temperature ranges Low/Med/Hi are also very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary Schmillary

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: So far nice and warm I really like the neck warmer. This is a good quality piece that runs just a bit small. Battery lasts about 4 hrs on high, 6-7 on medium. We dressed in layers long sleeve T-shirt-Vest-Light jacket and we were always comfortable , in fact we would turn the vest off because we were getting a bit warm The temp was about 36-40 Probably the only thing I don't like is the battery is semi proprietary so you probably need to by Ororo battery. I also think the price is a bit high ( should maybe be $100 or less) but I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Michael V.

customer_reviews.title: Intstruction guide was wrong.
customer_reviews.text: We followed the instructions on how to operate this item, but we could not get it to work, After a couple of days going back and forth with the Ororo rep we were ready to send it back. Finally, she figured out that our owner's guide was out of date, and that the operating instructions were wrong. Once we got the right operating instructions, the vest worked! We went through a lot of aggravation, because they put in the wrong owner's guide. Totally preventable!
customer_reviews.author: GK61

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: A lot of people are complaining about sizing. Let’s be real people, if your lying to yourself about your weight, order up a size. Everyone here almost had me order a medium for my wife. She is 5’3” 125lbs she wears small everything. I ordered small and it fits perfect. Small enough to wear under a sweater for cold days and big enough to wear over a long sleeve shirt on cool days. She used it twice watching our sons play football both days under 40F and she kept it on low and was perfectly comfortable. I highly recommend this for people who get cold easily.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pasqualone

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: We had to return and reorder a men’s large to fit the woman who was receiving this as a gift. We returned it no problem but it was a bit of a hassle. There was only one option for the women’s vest. The person receiving the vest is not a large person at all. She is more on the petite side. The vest itself is nice and worked well just not the size.
customer_reviews.author: Jg2011blue

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This vest is a game changer no ifs, ands or buts. It keeps your core warm and any outside activity seems to be more enjoyable; for the quilted material keeps you toasty. It’s true to size and is tapered at the bottom, keeping your hips warm. The zipper is a dark red and zips all the way up to your neck. Even wearing another jacket over it, you are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ann S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: This vest is soooo amazing ! The neck warmers Wowza!!! 🥰 the front warms are so nice more my hands! I have raynaud's disease so my hands are constantly cold so this is sooo nice!! I’ve used it camping with the family and in low low temps under my hunting gear!! The battery doesn’t even bother me don’t notice it. For size reference I’m 5’8” 140lbs and 34dd and it fits perfect very fitted. I also have along torso and it’s long enough ! :) I I’ll up the after a solid month use during winter!
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: If battery is bad that give you a hard time
customer_reviews.text: Love iti hope you battery don't go bad that give you a hard time that should give you a second battery for free I paid $129 for the vest and battery get it in the battery don't work so I get ahold of them they give you a hard time about getting another battery this is this ridiculous a big company like that they shouldn't ask any questions you should just they should just give you another battery for what you pay
customer_reviews.author: carol petrime

customer_reviews.title: Size is accurate and battery works great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife and she absolutely loves it. She's a size small and it fit perfectly. She has only tried it on and tested the heating elements this far over the last two days, so no long-term use yet to report on, but so far so good. She likes it so much that she immediately bought one for her sister. I looked at several competitors and chose this one. I'm really glad I did. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, fit, and warm
customer_reviews.text: I bought four of these for my whole family. Two for men, two for women. They are lightweight and warm, so I don't need to keep as many winter clothes in my closet, which saves me space. We like them. My daughter says that it keeps her warm in the morning while she is at the school's playground, and then it can fit into her locker easily since it is soft and lightweight and thin once she gets into the building.
customer_reviews.author: mback

customer_reviews.title: Warm. Battery position is odd. Need two-way zipper
customer_reviews.text: The warmth I can get from this vest is very satisfactory. But the Battery position is somewhat odd. I think you should put it at the back below the waist line. Since this vest is is fitted thru mid-hip line, it would have been better to have two way zipper so that people can sit down more comfortably with lower zipper open.
customer_reviews.author: Jee Young Yoon

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable heated vest I've ever worn!
customer_reviews.text: I love this heated vest. I have cold sensitivity due to a medical condition, and this vest allows me to be outdoors in the cold or a restaurant that's on the chilly side. The vest runs a little small. I normally wear a medium. I got an extra large because a review said they run small. A large would have been perfect. The button to turn on the vest is conveniently placed and quite the conversation starter, as it glows on your chest. I love the size of the battery. It sits in a pocket at your back, out of sight and not heavy at all. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get the revised battery!
customer_reviews.text: With regard to size, my wife typically wears an X-small and the small vest fits her perfectly. Initially we had issues with vest shutting off randomly as if it had a short. Contacted the seller and they sent me an updated battery immediately. And that fixed ALL THE issues! My wife works as a Nurse and ERs are ALWAYS cold, she can get 6-8 hours on medium temp and she is now in love with this vest!
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and warms up fast
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I absolutely love this vest. It heats up so fast, and makes the dread going outside much more bearable! The batter pack is a bit large on a smaller woman, so it’s definilty noticeable in that front pocket. The light that shows the setting is a little bright as well. All in all, I’m still glad to have this vest and it’s going to get a lot of use!
customer_reviews.author: Julz

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: While it ran a little on the smaller side, after exchanged for one size up it fit my wife perfectly. Everything about this vest feels like a premium product. My wife is always cold and this has kept her more than warm enough. I’m considering buying another for me. Best price is on amazon, and not the manufacturer website. Great customer service and warranty as well. Couldn’t be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Sizes are off
customer_reviews.text: The product looks ok.The size is off. Ordered a med. but it was way to small. Will write another review when I get the large one and she uses it. Received the large one and I would have given this 5 stars my wife loves this vest. The heat settings are very responsive and the battery life so far is good. The size chart needs to be fixed it is not even close.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Keeps turning off
customer_reviews.text: Wont stay on at all - turns off even will full battery - neck doest warm up either.
customer_reviews.author: New Mom

customer_reviews.title: Riding?  Get sleeves.
customer_reviews.text: Love this vest. though if motorcycling its not enough to keep just your core warm. I wore this on the highway and so much air blew up my sleeves it was impossible for this vest to keep me warm. The battery doesn't last long on high but its still a great product, I just regret not getting a full sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Buy for Best Husband award!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife for Christmas and she's told everyone how wonderful her gift was and how thoughtful I was to purchase it! Product itself is great quality, the battery lasts quite well, we can charge it in my vehicle also. The placement of the heating elements is great and with different settings, it's good for a broad range of temperatures.
customer_reviews.author: Chris G.

customer_reviews.title: Battery Pack Cord DOES come out
customer_reviews.text: I love the overall feel of the vest. It is lightweight. I have two issues with the vest. The first is that the cord does come out of the battery pack. When I put the battery/cord together and insert into the pouch it inevitably comes out. Now when I go outside to feed horses it comes out again. This is a drag. Secondly, the fit around the hip area is too tight with a sweater. I am 5'4" and 115 pounds. If I put layers on this vest doesn't work. I'd opt for something else if given the chance.
customer_reviews.author: lovetoread

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: A great purchase. I love this jacket. Keeps me warm and has multiple temperature settings. Wished it has full sleeves. I wear out with an overcoat and that's all I need in the death of freezing winter. Works both as a wind shield and a heated jacket. The battery connector in the jacket became loose early on though. I need to press it to make sure the battery pack is connected before turning it on. But otherwise, awesome buy.
customer_reviews.author: Waterade

customer_reviews.title: Warm! Sharp!
customer_reviews.text: Warm w/o even being on. Directions suck, i dont know how to tell what level i tirned it on to. Slick nice look. Med for wide shoulder little waisted 5’7” 130lb chic. Should fit over a sweatshirt. Very excited to wear this winter for raynauds help. -update: doesnt make it 12 hrs on low, maybe 6. Kicks off high pretty quickly. Might have tried venture brand for more time.
customer_reviews.author: Nun

customer_reviews.title: Battery doesn't last, but heats well.
customer_reviews.text: My wife likes it and it heats well. The problem we are having is with the battery. I was in constant contact with the seller and they sent me out two new batteries to try, all of which worked for half the estimated run time. With a fully charged battery, it would only work for 4-5 hours on low. Not the described 10 hours. The seller had us return all the batteries except for the last one sent out. Expect to order an extra $70 battery to achieve the described run times.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Larson

customer_reviews.title: Great vest
customer_reviews.text: Came as expected, heats up quickly. I’m 5’2”, 135lbs, C cup and bigger butt. I was worried it’d be too tight in areas but fits perfectly and I can even wear a sweater underneath if I want. Charger came mostly charged so I only had to plug it in for about an hour to get fully charged. The zipper is maroon in color which I like instead of a pinkish color like I thought I’d get. Lightweight, not bulky at all, can even wear casually and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size up since it is women’s fit to have room for hoodies. It heats up quickly. The light once it is done heating is very bright white light is my only complaint but I will just cut a piece of black tape for it or turn it off for a bit. The heat lasts so then can turn it back on for the much less distracting red light.
customer_reviews.author: leslie

customer_reviews.title: Great vest. I wore this vest at many Ice ...
customer_reviews.text: Great vest. I wore this vest at many Ice rinks with nothing but a shirt and cami underneath. I have also worn it under my winter coat while standing in freezing temperatures, at outdoor ice rinks, while watching my son play hockey. Each time I was warm. Lower setting for indoor rink and warmer setting for outdoor rinks. So far, well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: C.Van

customer_reviews.title: warm and looks great
customer_reviews.text: The vest fits well. I was concerned that the battery pack would make it too snug as I was on the border of the measurement, but it fits in well and is comfortable. I wore it last evening on a walk and was toasty warm and looks great. I would recommend this vest . It is made well, comfortable, warm and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Warm, stylish, and extremely comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this product! Not only is it warm, but it’s also stylish. Every time I wear this vest outside I get so many compliments. It is a little bit small. I am 5”6, 112 pounds and a small was a little bit tighter than expected, but was still comfortable. I love how the vest automatically adjusts to your body temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel Swoveland

customer_reviews.title: Heated womens vest
customer_reviews.text: I tried several heated vests for my wife, this is the only one we kept! Fits, well in a medium for my 5'6" 105 # wife, very attractive, very warm with good battery live. Worn daily since receipt! Customer service is really efficient, pleasant and helpful!
customer_reviews.author: F. J. Backer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: For Christmas I received a heated coat. It was too big and I ordered another one. Same thing, didn't fit right and on the coats I hated the double zipper. It was so hard to zip up, so I decided to order a vest that I could wear under my regular winter coat. Great purchase. My son plays hockey and I'm always cold so having this vest to wear at the rink is awesome. Fits perfect, not too bulky to fit under my coat and the battery lasts. The heat is distributed well through the coat and I like the neck area having heat. I would definitely recommend this vest.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Maybe try another brand
customer_reviews.text: Battery is already giving me issues. I have had for a month. I use it to walk my dog and I have used it at one football game.
customer_reviews.author: Campos-Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Weight off balance and uncomfortable battery placement.
customer_reviews.text: Wife not happy. Says item is not correct to weight distribution. The battery is right at hip bone making it very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente

customer_reviews.title: Absolute dud
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to help with some health issues after overwhelming positive feedback from others in my boat. It looks great and that's where the good ends for me. The heating unit made it barely warmer than just wearing a light weight vest with no focused heat in the described areas. I wouldn't recommend this item regardless of what you need it for.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Goblin

customer_reviews.title: Cold Office No More
customer_reviews.text: My work office is freezing throughout the year. My co-workers and I have electric throw blankets yet we are still struggling to stay warm. I finally had it and ordered the vest. My co-workers are not ordering the vest because they agree it's a great product! **Advice: Read the instruction manual. Do not try to "figure it out" on your own.
customer_reviews.author: Schmelbs

customer_reviews.title: fits great but the battery does not last long and there is a big light on the front
customer_reviews.text: The worst thing about this vest is the giant stupid looking light on the front. I covered it with a black adhesive patch or otherwise I would not wear it. The patch covered the light but it still shows through a little bit. My other complaint is the battery, which stinks. I like how the vest heats and how it fits. It is nice to wear on cool fall or winter days.
customer_reviews.author: Lburr RVA

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you warm, just doesn't stay charged longer than 5 hours
customer_reviews.text: The vest does not stay charged for 10 hours, even on the low setting. The most it stays warm is 5 hours on low. That being said, I do love the concept and it does keep me warm on the chilly mornings, but wish device stayed charged longer than 5 hours, hence only 3 stars. If it stayed charged for the entire 10 hours as advertised, I'd definitely give 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Diana D. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Awesome vest!
customer_reviews.text: Vest looks and feels great! Sizing is small, too small. By the size chart my wife would have to wear this(medium) over a t-shirt. I think the size chart for the women's chest should include cup size. The vest fit around the neck and waist areas, but way to small in the chest area! Gonna try a Large.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Only good for one year
customer_reviews.text: I am so, so upset. I LOVED this vest. Then, come my 1 year anniversary with this Innovative piece of wardrobery, it * STOPPED. WORKING*. As in, one day it was fine, and the next day it stopped turning on. Battery still charges and will charge other things, like my phone. I'm so disappointed. I would have given 5 stars, but I'm just so broken hearted that this vest gave up on me so soon. I want to buy another but cannot afford to put the cash out right now. 😢
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Irregular Fit
customer_reviews.text: I’m a true size medium in everything I wear. However, this vest was irregular in sizing. The chest was more like a size large and a size small in the hips which was very disappointing because I read reviews and comparisons and this vest was preferred. I hope this isn’t the cut in general and I just happened to get one that missed quality control... that being said, the packaging was very nice, it came with a convenient zippered travel bag and the item arrived in good condition. I was reluctant to exchange for another size medium so I returned the vest for a refund. I guess I’ll be trying a different brand instead.
customer_reviews.author: Happy so far

customer_reviews.title: Nice product , order one size larger
customer_reviews.text: The sizes were smaller that I expected, but consistent, the size chart may need to be reviewed by manufacturer? Very light weight , Two ways to charge is a great idea , I guess you could use the USB port on the battery pack to power other devices ? As well as providing another charging option for the garment. It should come with a car cigarette lighter adapter and additional cords . These were gifts for mom, sis and Neice , sis wears here’s all the time
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for those cold winter days....
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my wife, who is ALWAYS cold...and she has been very happy. It warms her core and she swears it radiates throughout her whole body. Battery life is great and it works well as an exterior vest or below a wind breaker/jacket for those extra frigid days. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻!! Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: This vest is the BEST!!! Made well and I love the heated neck. I was unsure of the size chart so I got a medium and a large. I’m only 5.2/111lbs but those sizes are tricky. Normally I’m a small. The medium is perfect to layer under or not. If you are going to wear all day I recommend an additional battery. It takes a bit of time to charge. Longer than a lunchtime. Have an extra on hand. Especially if you are running it on high. 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Chickiegal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It's a little snug but the wearer likes the fit. Just totally pleased that it was exactly as advertised and a perfect gift for someone who suffers with the cold in many different environments. I recommend this product. I did suffer being scammed before I found this company so I was very nervous to make this purchase...but glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Not thrilled with it
customer_reviews.text: The vest keeps you warm but I find the fit is awkward. The small fit me great except for the bottom portion was very tight and when used for golf everything falls out of my pocket. I'm a size 0-2 so no reason the waist should fit as tight as it does. Sizing up would just make the rest of it too large I wouldn't buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Dona

customer_reviews.title: Must have for the winter!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had bought this sooner. Worked long hours outside in the cold and no amount of layering was keeping me warm. Battery lasted on low for about 10.5 hours. Coworker recommended buying a second battery ($70, so I skipped it because this was fine for the amount of hours I needed it). Definitely worth the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa E.

customer_reviews.title: Warms my Heart
customer_reviews.text: I spoke to a soccer Dad who had one of these and he liked it. I am impressed with the product and will be relying on it to keep me warm in Antarctica. It is sized well, seems to be constructed well with a good zipper, can we wiped clean with a damp cloth and the instructions are very clear.
customer_reviews.author: J. Heath

customer_reviews.title: Keep her warm!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vest for my daughter, she wears once so far when she go out with Marching Band team for football game, she is very happy with warmness. she is out there for 3 ~ 4 hours, she turned on medium first, then high, battery lasted till she turned off, the vest fits her great if she has only base layer under the vest. The light on the front is bright, I may cover it with tape next time, like other customer suggested.
customer_reviews.author: WY

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: The battery pack is a little heavy for the material however that's a minor issue when you're freezing. This vest really was super warm. Wore it in Flagstaff,AZ while hunting in December. I only turned it on while sitting still. It was instant heat I could feel on my neck right away. I loved having this vest up there. I will be reinforcing the pocket so the battery won't hang.
customer_reviews.author: ameltom

product_meta.title: ORORO Women's Lightweight Heated Vest with Battery Pack
feature_bullets: 100% Nylon; Model is 5'10" and wearing a size small.
NEAT AND TAILORED DESIGN: Lightweight insulated for you to wear in many ways with unrestricted movement; Water and wind-resistant.

KEEP YOUR BODY AND HANDS WARM: 4 carbon fiber heating elements generating heat across the collar, mid-back, as well as underneath two pockets for core-body warmth. 3 available heating settings can be adjusted with just a simple press of the button.
QUICK AND LONG-LASTING WARMTH: Fast heating in seconds with 7.4V cUL/UL certified battery; Up to 10 working hours on a single charge; USB port for charging smartphones.

FOR ALL OCCASIONS: Perfect for the daily commute, walking your dog in the brisk fall air, tailgating for your favorite football team, wearing underneath your winter jacket or even in a way-too-cold office.
EASY CARE: Machine washable; The heating elements and vest construction are designed to endure 50+ machine wash cycles.
